google_play_reviews.content: By far the most promising FF app but buggy and not updated in three years. The spell list in Citadel of Chaos frequently bugs out, appending a junk character to the end of each spell, randomly duplicating spells, or vanishing entirely. Character creation will blank out your stats if you change your device's orientation during before finishing. Sometimes the notes screen will stop displaying new notes until you re-open the app. If it all worked a little better this would be a 5 out of 5.

Original review was a 3/5, as it needed auto-save ability and/or a warning when you are going back to the menu to prevent lost progress if you've forgotten to save. This has now been implemented by the developer so I've increased my score to 4/5.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Just to clarify, you're suggestion has been implemented and published. :)

google_play_reviews.content: This is a fantastic app but many of the books specific interfaces are buggy. Did space assassin, freeway warrior, rings of kether and seas of blood and all had bugs. Unfortunately looks like the app is abandoned since it hasnt been updated in years so no bug fixes comming :(
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Hello Frank. In fact it's been a long time since I was able to work on this. Do you want to send me an email with a list of bugs to see if I can do some hot fixing?

google_play_reviews.content: did not save all notes Does not let me roll my own dice did crash in the middle of the session
A great tool for games on the go.

Excellent app and really worth it for FF books which it is personalised to I.e. it covers off individual rules in specific books etc. Only downside is that it hasn't been updated in a while so doesn't include some of the more recent books hence the four stars. If all were updated then it would have an immediate five.

Perfect app for gaming on the move!! I've been unable to acquire game sheets during lockdown, so this app is a great way to track progress until I can access my printer again. Easy to use, intuitive and detailed. Love it.
The only half decent app for FF adventure sheets and looks like it's abandoned...
Need to edit my review. It does save now, but only if you exit your sheet and save when it prompts you. If you press save on the sheet it doesn't do it. Still, better than not saving at all.
A good, simple but well presented way of keeping track of your fighting fantasy games.
Great app to help with FF books. Well thought out and clear. Thanks!

Useful, perfect for playing these books from anywhere, and for me perfect for playing from bed without worrying about having a pencil and dice with me. Just wishing the app keeps growing, with more FF books being supported, but since this is an open source effort I can't ask for more. Thanks!!

Haven't picked up these books in over 25 years, but they've been given a new lease of life thanks to this app! I did notice though that when you successfully test your luck in battle it only subtracts 1 stamina point from the enemy rather than 2, but you're able to subtract another manually so its not that big a deal. It would also be great to be able to add handicaps for the player as well as the enemy during a battle, for those odd occasions where your skill score must be reduced temporarily.

An invaluable tool to play FF gamebooks. Really nicely designed with the different screens that you can swipe through, and great that it matches the different gamebook setups. The only thing that could improve it is to allow you to edit existing notes rather than post new ones, but this is minor. Enjoying reading FF again using this!

Beautifully designed app. Has everything needed to play all the different books and even links to the wiki for info on the books. The UI is very well thought out and it's set up to allow swiping from screen to screen for different activities such as combat or inventory or taking notes etc. If you're a lover of these books then this is all you'll ever need to play. Very highly recommended.
Missing 4 books (Blood of the Zombies, Stormslayer, Night of the Necromancer, Assassins of Allansia), but still an invaluable help!
Does what it says...and for free it deserves 5 stars
Love that you have options for other languages in the settings. Several of my FF books are in French and it's easier to be able to have the app and book in the same language.
Works well. Deathtrap Dungeon has a flaw in the initial stats display. It only shows 1 digit instead of 2. So if your stamina is 21 it only displays the 2. If it's 19 it only displays the 1.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Hello, I've fixed it. Thanks for reporting :)

google_play_reviews.content: Rubbish dont instal
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Hey John. I'm sorry the app didn't meet your expectations. Can you send me an email with some feedback so I can understand the issue? Kind Regards

google_play_reviews.content: i do not onow how i ppayed as a kid in the 80s and 90s without something like this. I do remember lots of papers being used to scratch down notes and the like. does everything i uaed to do on my notes so well!!!! playing is a breeze with the app. just died about 13 times in Deathtrap Dungeon... now for another playthrough.
It's great for the books that are supported. Would like to see more from vault of the vampire onwards
Played Forest of Doom for an hour, saving my adventure as i went, but it says there's nothing there to load.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Hi Steve, I've addressed the issue and published an update a couple of months ago. Would love for you to give it another try.

google_play_reviews.content: Great app, but it would be really good if you could see your own stats in the combat tab
Brilliant app, it saves me writing in my game books and writing out my own adventure sheets. Can't recommend it enough

This app has made me pick back up my fighting fantasy books, now if I die I can restart at a checkpoint or if I start again I can have a new game up and running in seconds. The automated combat makes fighting so much faster. The only thing I miss is a mapping function but with all this offers I can live with that. The look of it could do with being a like the books theme wise but the interface is so clean and easy to use. Top marks to this app, I would have happily paid money for this.
enjoy this app very helpfull only thing stopping 5 star is there is no Night of the Necromancer sheet

Fantastic! Thanks so much for doing this, maybe now after all these years 
I'll finish one :)

De 1 estrela a 5 estrelas. Esta é A app para as Aventuras Fantásticas. 
Obrigado pelo update relâmpago.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Bom dia Marco. Obrigado pela tua review. O bug que falas foi detectado há umas semanas e já tinha sido alvo de correcção. Infelizmente não tive tempo de aplicar a correcção na versão da play store. Acabei de o fazer. Gostava imenso que desses mais uma chance à app após fazeres update! 🙏
